text: Staycation di Bandung emang udah paling cocok di Grand Dafam Braga. Sudah kesekian kali sy selalu kembali ke hotel ini klo ke Bandung dan selalu diberikan kesan yg baik. Staycation kali ini sy butuh kamar yg banyak. Langsung saja sy kontak Miss Aira utk booking 5 unit kamar top grade Grand Dafam yg terdiri dr 2 unit tipe Family Suite 3BR, 2 unit tipe Premier 2BR dan 1 unit kamar tipe Superior King utk tanggal 25-27 Maret 2022. Jumlah rombongan kami besar dan untuk saat ini hanya Grand Dafam Braga yg bisa memenuhi kebutuhan tsb. Dengan dibantu Miss Aira yg sangat ramah, informatif serta cekatan, proses reservasi kamar dapat berjalan secara efektif dan cepat. 5 unit kamar yg kami inapi merupakan tipe kamar yg baru direnovasi sehingga memberikan kesan fresh dan modern dgn fasilitas tiap kamar ada SMart TV, kitchen sink dan pantry beserta kelengkapan piring gelas dan sofa panjang buat leyeh2 klo malas ke kamar. Atensi yg diberikan Miss Aira dan staff hotel lainnya sangat baik. Dari awal kedatangan kami disambut dengan baik dan sampai waktu check out kami tidak menemukan kendala selama menginap. Apabila kami ke Bandung lagi di lain kesempatan, Grand Dafam Braga pasti prioritas utama kami. Special thanks to Miss Aira yg sudah membantu dr awal booking sampai proses check out. Keep up the good work.
title: Top Grade Staycation

text:
I stay here for 2 nights with family. We booked condotel 2 rooms with bath tub at price around Rp.900k/night through OTA. 

(+) The hotel attached with Braga citywalk mall which nearly empty but its on great location at famous Braga Street. The staff service friendly, prompt and responsive. Hot shower superb. TV channel selectiona great, AC good function, rooms service (nasgor) superb at Rp.68k/portion include water bottle 

(-) However there's some point need to improve such as. In our room #1902, the toilet smells stinks everytime it's flush, happen since day 1. The wardrobe broken, microwave insides really dirty, ants everywhere and cleaning works need to go detail. 
Another thing to concern is the bath towel conditions was awful. Not stars hotel standard at all. (Pic attached). 

I suggest the room goes maintenance before back to sell and please provide only clean-white towel for almost 1 million room price. 

For this time being not recommend but will be back should the improvement done.
title: Will be back should improvement done

text:
While the extensive breakfast spread can get boring after 2 days (we stayed for 4 nights), the service by the staffs were exceptional! The concierge, Pak Dani helped us to book a cab when our Gojek lost his way & recommended us places to eat & housekeeping even went to look for the requested shaver and sewing kit and sent it in the middle of the night eventho I said they can send it in the morning. These are just the few examples among the many we had throughout our stay. Also, I would personally come again for their homemade Bandrek made by their own kitchen. They don’t sell it though, though I really wished they would’ve cos I would’ve bought plenty to bring back home cos it was just that good!

Except for the confusing lobby and same breakfast menu served daily, everything else was amazing. Beds were great and clean, water pressure strong & truly great staffs who made sure our needs were met.
title: Exceptional service

text: I stayed in 2 bedrooms condo. The condo was spacious and clean. The toilets were old and the seat started to peel off but it’s still well-maintained. But the breakfast was a disaster. It’s cheap (about 80k/person) but the ingredients quality and taste was horrible. Nothing tasted good, even the cut fruits that they dip in sugar. They provide live cooking of meatballs, and the meatballs were raw when it was served to us. Better just cook it in the kitchen. I would recommend staying in this hotel but don’t take the breakfast. The hotel is already strategically located in the busy Braga street where lots of cafe and breakfast restos are available.
title: Nice clean hotel. Horrible breakfast.
